price: No hay duda de que Dios sabe lo que ocultan y lo que manifiestan. Él no ama a los soberbios.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُسۡتَكۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna innahu lā yuḥibbu al-mus'takbirīna
